title: Her Milky Toll
description: Being a new mom in a controlled but neglected marriage, Mandy didn't think life held much for her anymore besides her duties as wife, mother and sister until one, lonely night at the movie theater she met someone who showed a unique interest in her, or was it a unique interest in her big, milky breasts?Now trapped alone with this attractive stranger who won't take no for an answer Mandy finds herself torn between her duty and her desire. Should she suffer through or give into passion as strange lips suckle at her enormous, lactating mammaries?
author: Calloway North
